name: Handsome Ransom
description:
Handsome Ransom was made for IGMC 2018 as a proof/prototype of concept.

It's a sketchy game about an even sketchier Kobold who wished to be a princess.  Featuring very colorful not-dragons and a turn-based RPG system based on skill management instead of levels or pesky MP costs.

(If you enjoyed this game's potential, please keep an eye on this page for a link to a different gamepage to play an updated version of the game *AFTER* the voting period is over.)
